entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:06 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34 with temperature falling to minus 37 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 34 with temperature falling to minus 37 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 32 with temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon.
